avdta.network.node

Class NodeRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.NodeRecord

  • public class NodeRecord
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to represent and manipulate the data associated with a Node.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NodeRecord(int id, int type, double lng, double lat, double elev) 
      NodeRecord(java.lang.String line)
      Constructs this NodeRecord from the specified line of input data

      Returns whether this represents a zone by checking the type against ReadNetwork.CENTROID.

      Updates the elevation

      • setType

        public void setType(int type)
        Updates the type. The type code is used to specify whether this Node is a Intersection or Zone, and what the IntersectionControl is
        Parameters:
        type - the new type
